data.meta_description: Apr 7, 2024 - Survive Ltd. Violet Transparent 2LP Gatefold Double Heavyweight Vinyl is by Stratovarius. Now available from Vinyl Records Manchester on sale in stock and in a brand new condition priced at only Â£28.99 + delivery. Seven years after the release of their last albumEternal , Stratovarius once more prove their status as Symphonic Metal flagship and come back with a big bang.Not only musically the band is once more at the pulse of time The environment and humanitys future have always been an important and reoccurring theme in Stratovarius music and so the title of the new albumSurvive as well as the accompanying artwork dont surprise especially in the view of the current global situation.A blistering comeback from one of heavy metals most seminal bands, Survive is full of dynamics and drama, feeding on a wide range of emotions along the way. But the core message that this triumphant endeavour conveys is one of struggle, defiance, hope and victory.Best exemplified by its profoundly rousing title track, Survive is the Stratovarius spirit in exquisite musical form, with all the darkness and light that goes with it.. Vinyl Heavyweight Double Gatefold 2LP Transparent Violet Ltd. Hit the Read More Button, for more track details and delivery information.
